import { Modal, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" function AddTodoForm( ) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false) const {register, handleSubmit} = useForm() const onSubmit = (data) => { () => setShow(false) console.log(data) axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/todo-all/', data) .then((response) => { console.log(response) }) } return (
setShow(false)} size='lg' >

Add Item
Title Description
) } export default AddTodoForm
